TowerDepth.Name: Almost Flat

TowerDepth.Name: Shallow
TowerDepth.Description: The tower isn't as big as people make it out to be, but don't underestimate the dangers in it.

TowerDepth.Name: Standard
TowerDepth.Description: Just the tower you've come to expect from what you had heard of it.
